FuncDef:
The npcc mode command configures the NPCC function to work in high throughput mode or low-latency mode.
The undo npcc mode command restores the mode of the NPCC function to the default setting. The npcc mode command configures the NPCC function to work in high throughput mode or low-latency mode. The undo npcc mode command restores the mode of the NPCC function to the default setting. By default, the NPCC function works in high throughput mode. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.
